item.title: Members.txt
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

How can I check if this is working when i log in like You are a premium member or not?

Heres the code

public int checkmembers() { try { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/members.txt")); String data = null; while ((data = in.readLine()) != null) { if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data)) { return 5; } } } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("Critical error while checking members.!"); e.printStackTrace(); } return 0; }
